body.raw:
Huan Zhang is a software engineer at Capgemini, Singapore. He specializes in building high-performance distributed systems, advanced search architectures, and optimizing cloud-based infrastructures. Previously at Works Applications, he significantly enhanced Elasticsearch and DynamoDB solutions, achieving remarkable efficiency gains in search performance and data migration.

Huan holds a Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence from Nanyang Technological University (NTU) and a Master of Science in Mechanical Engineering from the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST). In his free time, he enjoys exploring innovative software architectures and cloud technologies.
